actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right to life to the unborn, the ill, the aged, or the incapacitated.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits depriving any human being, from the moment of conception, of life without due process of law or denying equal protection of the laws. Prohibits depriving any human being of life on account of illness, age, or incapacity.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right to life to the unborn, the ill, the aged, or the incapacitated.
